EmailTemplate.name: 02_11_15 5.1 Invitation.5.1 Webinar Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Have You Heard About Our Latest Release?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=VMT Champion}}, Yesterday we announced our latest release: VMTurbo Operations Manager 5.1 <http://vmturbo.com/blog/operations-manager-v5-1?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021115>. This release marks another step in enabling customers like yourself to assure application performance while maximizing efficiency of the underlying infrastructure. The same mission we’ve been on since 2009. Worried about QoS for your Java® Apps? Stop living in the past; live in the now. The Application Control Module <http://info.vmturbo.com/SI0H1g0bg010ZZV0200qptB?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021115> will autoscale up or out based on real-time application demand, allowing you to assure application performance without over provisioning. What about self-service scaling? Covered. VMTurbo's Cloud Control Module <http://info.vmturbo.com/dg0gV2CZqp0Hb00I1u010Z0?http://info.vmturbo.com/SI0H1g0bg010ZZV0200qptB?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021115> provides your users with self-service scaling without sacrificing application performance. I/O intensive apps forcing you to overprovision? Not anymore. The Storage Control Module <http://info.vmturbo.com/lqIpv000g2bV0H1g10Z0D0Z?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021115> - now integrated with HP 3PAR and Pure Storage ensures your most demanding apps get the resources they need while maximizing the efficient use of your storage infrastructure, preventing over provisioning. Ready to learn more? Join us for our webinar February, 19th at 1:30 PM EST <http://vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021115> Besides this do you have any questions? Are there any issues? Are you using the Green Circle Community? Would you like to throw some time on the calendar for a complimentary healthcheck? The Customer Experience Team is here to serve your needs – TAKE ADVANTAGE OF US!! Feel free to reply here. Best, Your Dedicated Customer Experience Team
